\documentclass[a4paper]{article}

\usepackage{Sweave}

\DefineVerbatimEnvironment{Sinput}{Verbatim} {xleftmargin=2em,
                                              frame=single}
\title{Sweave with boxes}

\begin{document}
\input{see-concordance}
\maketitle

both enclosed in boxes.
